Text:
Translation...

When suddenly a global geological disturbance threatens the planet, begins a desperate search for a missing writer presumed that he can predict future disasters. But soon, the author is found dead. He has an old divining rod in his possession, that images of the future indicates the person who holds it. When the rod a bleak future of the planet shows, begins a race against time to search for ancient resources that will help prevent the distortions that the planet literally into two.
